t: Amazon.com: Sweet Tennessee: CDs & Vinyl
s: Absolutely fantastic album. My first exposure to Judah & The Lion was the song Back's Against the Wall and I was immediately hooked. I loved the lyrics, the general flow of the song as well as the variety of instruments. The song is incredibly catchy and i can't help but tap my toes and sing along.
